name: RES_NLP_CITATION
description: Contains citation information used by the NLP model when creating RES records.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CITATION
columns.description: Holds citation information used by the model when generating the recommendations and follow ups.
